title: Goa
description: Experience the perfect blend of sun, sand, and sea in India's party capital. From pristine beaches to vibrant nightlife, Goa offers an unforgettable coastal escape.

title: Kerala
description: Discover 'God's Own Country' with its serene backwaters, lush tea plantations, and rich cultural heritage. A paradise for nature lovers and peace seekers.

title: Rajasthan
description: Step into the royal world of Rajasthan with magnificent palaces, desert safaris, and vibrant culture. Experience the grandeur of India's princely state.

title: Himachal Pradesh
description: Escape to the mountains with breathtaking views, adventure sports, and serene hill stations. Perfect for trekking, skiing, and spiritual retreats.

title: Uttarakhand
description: Explore the land of gods with sacred temples, pristine rivers, and majestic mountains. A spiritual and adventure destination rolled into one.

title: Kashmir
description: Visit 'Paradise on Earth' with stunning valleys, pristine lakes, and snow-capped mountains. Experience the beauty that inspired poets for centuries.

title: Sikkim
description: Discover the hidden gem of Northeast India with monasteries, mountain passes, and diverse flora. A perfect blend of culture and nature.

title: Ladakh
description: Journey to the 'Land of High Passes' with dramatic landscapes, ancient monasteries, and unique culture. An adventure of a lifetime awaits.

title: Tamil Nadu
description: Explore the rich Dravidian culture with magnificent temples, beautiful hill stations, and pristine beaches. A journey through history and tradition.

title: Karnataka
description: Experience the perfect mix of heritage, nature, and modernity. From ancient ruins to coffee plantations, Karnataka has it all.

title: Madhya Pradesh
description: Discover the heart of India with ancient temples, wildlife sanctuaries, and architectural marvels. A treasure trove of history and nature.

title: Gujarat
description: Explore the vibrant state with white desert, ancient stepwells, and rich cultural heritage. Experience the colors and flavors of Gujarat.
